name: Samurai Revengeance
description:
Samurai Revengeance is a walking simulator where you slash bullets out of air.

This game was made in 24 hours for Pixel Day 2021 on Newgrounds, but I wasn't satisfied with it and compiler bugs happened so I never submitted it.

The game is fairly short if you don't suck at it, as it only has three levels.

Audio cues are somewhat important, so you should probably wear headphones.The HTML version of the game has some visual and audio bugs because Gamemaker Studio hates me.

Controls:

  • Left arrow to walk backward.
  • Right arrow to walk forward.
  • Down arrow to duck.
  • Ctrl to attack.
  • Enter to pause/skip some dialogue.
  • Shift to speed up the game.

Cheats:

  • It disables achievements (Newgrounds), and only works when playing.
  • Preformed by pressing "DELETE" and a button.
  • DELETE + 1 = Restart Game.
  • DELETE + 2 = Title screen.
  • DELETE + 3 = Intro.
  • DELETE + 4 = Level 1.
  • DELETE + 5 = Level 2.
  • DELETE + 6 = Level 3.
  • DELETE + 7 = Ending.
  • DELETE + 8 = Statistics Screen.
  • DELETE + Alt = Teleport forward.
  • Shift + Alt = 4x Game Speed (Not counted as cheating).

Credits:

Programming - Yew

Title Track - Yew

Most Sprites - Yew

Some sprites based off CC0 OpenGameArt Sprites.

Some sounds from freesound.org.
